data.text: It is actually reported that there is fornication among you, a kind of fornication that is not even 5:1 named 95.5% ¦ --- CT 3.3%named among the Gentiles, for a man has his father's wife.
And you are puffed up! You should have mourned instead and removed the man who did this from among you.
For though I am absent in body, I am present in spirit. And I have already judged the man who did this, just as though I were present.
So when you are gathered together in the name of our Lord Jesus 5:4 Christ ¦ --- NA SBL WHChrist and I am with you in spirit, along with the power of our Lord Jesus 5:4 Christ ¦ --- CTChrist,
hand this man over to Satan for the destruction of his flesh, so that his spirit may be saved in the day of the Lord 5:5 Jesus ¦ --- NA SBL WHJesus.
Your boasting is not good. Do you not know that a little leaven leavens the whole lump?

5:7 Purge ¦ Therefore purge ANT BYZ PCK TRPurge out the old leaven so that you may be a new lump of dough, since you really are unleavened. For Christ, our Passover lamb, has been sacrificed 5:7 for us 91.4% ¦ --- CT 3.5%for us.
So then, let us celebrate the feast, not with old leaven, nor with the leaven of malice and evil, but with the unleavened bread of sincerity and truth.
I wrote to you in my letter not to associate with fornicators.
5:10 Yet ¦ --- CTYet I certainly did not mean the fornicators of this world or the greedy 5:10 or ¦ and CTor swindlers or idolaters, since you would then need to go out of the world.

But now I am writing to you not to associate with anyone who is named as a brother if he is a fornicator or greedy, an idolater or a reviler, a drunkard or a swindler; do not even eat with such a man.
For what have I to do with judging those who are outside the church? Do you not judge those who are inside the church?
